title: Twisted Treeline Tournament

embed.description: A friendly tournament run on League of Legends 3v3 map, Twisted Treeline on the Oceanic server. Open to all players. Prizing: (Waiting for Riot) 1st - 3200 RP and Triumphant Ryze to every player 2nd - 2400 RP to every player 3rd - 1600 RP to every player 4th - 800 RP to every player This tournament will be held every month unless it clashes.

body:
I'm running my tournament again for the third time.
All players and teams welcome to the only Twisted Treeline tournament that is run regularly.
Grab two of your mates and join in the fun, and maybe win some cool prizes. 
Would love to see a Riot team enter this month, was some interest the first one but sadly, they were busy with Armageddon and PAX.
Hope to see you there :) 
{{champion:54}} : This tournament is rock solid

replies.body:
Seems legit.

AIming for the Nunu Bot.
